content:
Springfield, Massachusetts!

I've got you covered. According to online directories and reviews, here are some coffee shops near Main St and Elm St in Springfield, MA:

1. The Coffee Oasis (1441 Main St): A popular spot with a cozy atmosphere, serving coffee, tea, and pastries. They open at 6:00 am, so you can grab a cup before your 7:45 am bus.
2. Dunkin' Donuts (1555 Main St): A well-known chain with a location near the intersection of Main St and Elm St. They're open 24/7, so you can get your morning coffee fix at any time.
3. The Daily Grind (1365 Elm St): A local favorite with a relaxed vibe, offering specialty coffee drinks, sandwiches, and baked goods. They open at 6:30 am, giving you enough time to grab a coffee before your bus.

Please note that hours may be subject to change, so it's always a good idea to call ahead or check the coffee shop's website or social media to confirm their hours before heading out.

I hope this helps, and you find a great spot to start your day!
